channel.title: BUbuisnessAndMarket
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from BUbuisnessAndMarket, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: When the house loses: Here’s how DraftKings just lost $250 million in revenue
FTX sues Scaramucci to recoup money put into showy investments
item.description: The lawsuit against the former White House communications director is one of 23 filed in the bankruptcy court of Delaware on Friday.

item.title: Monkeys that escaped a breeding facility are still on the loose but jumping around the compound, cooing at other monkeys still inside
item.description: Alpha Genesis, federal health officials and police all said the monkeys pose no risk to public health. The facility breeds the monkeys to sell to medi...

item.title: Starbucks is making changes — here’s what customers and industry experts think
This ad-tech company's stock is now up more than 600% this year
Biden and Trump will meet in the Oval Office on Wednesday, the White House says
item.description: But Trump, a Republican, did not host Biden, a Democrat, for a sit-down after the 2020 election, when Trump lost his reelection bid.

item.title: Can RFK Jr. really ‘run wild’ on healthcare? Investors shouldn’t panic yet.
Trump victory sparks seismic week for stock market. Investors need to keep cool.

item.title: Fed’s Kashkari says stronger economy could mean fewer rate cuts
